commands.help: View a list and description of all the commands
commands.list: View a list all of the Clan on the server
commands.info: View info on a given Clan
commands.rank: Shows the Clan rank of the given player
commands.playerinfo: Shows the power and max power of the given player
commands.map: View a map of the Clan claim to land around you
commands.invites: View a list of all the invites you've received from Clan
commands.join: Become a member of the given Clan
commands.reject: Reject an invite from the given Clan
commands.members: Shows all the Clan members sorted into their ranks
commands.motd: View your Clan's message of the day
commands.chat: Change who can see messeges you enter into chat
commands.claim: Claim a chunk for your Clan
commands.unclaim: Remove your Clan's claim on a chunk
commands.ally: Make a given Clan an ally of your Clan
commands.enemy: Make a given Clan an enemy of your Clan
commands.neutral: Make your relationship with a given Clan neutral
commands.kick: Remove a given member from your Clan
commands.invite: Invite a player to your Clan
commands.uninvite: Remove an invite to a given player
commands.setmotd: Set your Clan's message of the day
commands.sethome: Set the home location for your Clan
commands.desc: Set the description of your Clan
commands.promote: Promote a member of your Clan to a higher rank
commands.demote: Demote a member of your Clan to a lower rank
commands.setrank: Set the rank of a member of your Clan
commands.setowner: Hand over ownership of your Clan to another member

adminCommands.help: View a list and description of all the admin commands
adminCommands.setfaction: Forcefully set a player to be a member of the given Clan, ignoring size limits
adminCommands.home: Instantly teleport to your Clan home, ignoring cooldowns
adminCommands.claim: Forcefully claim a chunk for the given Clan, or your Clan if no Clan is given
adminCommands.unclaim: Forcefully remove any Clan's claim to a chunk
adminCommands.ally: Forcefully create an alliance between 2 Clan
adminCommands.enemy: Forcefully make a pair of Clan enemies
adminCommands.neutral: Forcefully make a pair of Clan neutral
adminCommands.kick: Remove a given member from the given Clan
adminCommands.invite: Invites a player to the given Clan
adminCommands.uninvite: Remove an invite to a given player from a given Clan
adminCommands.setmotd: Set the given Clan's message of the day
adminCommands.sethome: Set the home location for a given Clan
adminCommands.desc: Set the description of a given Clan
adminCommands.flag: Set or remove the given Clan's flags
adminCommands.promote: Promote a member of a given Clan to a higher rank
adminCommands.demote: Demote a member of a given Clan to a lower rank
adminCommands.setrank: Set the rank of a member of a given Clan Clan
adminCommands.setowner: Set the owning member of a Clan
adminCommands.setpower: Sets the power of a given Clan
adminCommands.resetpower: Sets the power of a given Clan to its default power
adminCommands.setmaxpower: Sets the max power of a given Clan
adminCommands.resetmaxpower: resets the max power of a given Clan back to its default max power
